synopsis.text: Rintarou and Katsuhiro Otomo, two renowned figures in the anime and manga world, come together in a unique collaboration to create "48x61," a captivating short film produced by the esteemed Studio Madhouse. The film's title pays homage to the ages of the two creators at the time of production, with Rintarou being 61 and Otomo 48. The storyline unfolds as an exhilarating bicycle race between the two main characters, who share the names of their creators. This engaging narrative, crafted by the minds behind iconic works like "Astro Boy," "Metropolis," "Akira," and "Mushishi," promises a thrilling ride for viewers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
